title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. X, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 672 - RESERVOIR RELEASES REGULATIONS: OTHER
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. X, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 672 - RESERVOIR RELEASES REGULATIONS: OTHER
State Regulations

Subpart 672-1 - Reservoir Releases Regulations-General (§ 672-1.1 to 672-1.9)

Subpart 672-2 - ASHOKAN, KENSICO, RONDOUT AND SCHOHARIE RESERVOIRS (§ 672-2.1 to 672-2.4)

Subpart 672-3 - CROTON SYSTEM RESERVOIRS (§ 672-3.1 to 672-3.6)

Subpart 672-4 - Toronto, Swinging Bridge, Cliff Lake and Rio Reservoirs (§ 672-4.1 to 672-4.5)

Subpart 672-5 - East Sidney Lake, Sleepy Hollow Lake, Cooper Lake and Sturgeon Pool (§ 672-5.1 to 672-5.6)

Subpart 672-6 - References (§ 672-6.1 to 672-6.2)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. X, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 672

Not applicable to releases from Cannonsville, Pepacton
and Neversink reservoirs, or diversions from Schoharie reservoir through the

Shandaken tunnel. Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law, §§1-0101, 3-0301, 15-0805

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
